tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quiz_questions (
    question_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    question_text TEXT,
    correct_answer TEXT,
    incorrect_answer1 TEXT,
    incorrect_answer2 TEXT,
    incorrect_answer3 TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Answer (
	answer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	answer_text TEXT NOT NULL,
	question_id INT NOT NULL,
	is_correct BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (question_id) REFERENCES Question(question_id)
);

CREATE TABLE quiz_attempts (
    attempt_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    quiz_id INT,
    score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (quiz_id) REFERENCES quizzes(quiz_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Students ( student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(50), last_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), date_of_birth DATE );
CREATE TABLE Courses ( course_id INT PRIMARY KEY, course_name VARCHAR(100), instructor VARCHAR(50), credit_hours INT );
CREATE TABLE Questions ( question_id INT PRIMARY KEY, question_text TEXT, correct_answer TEXT, difficulty_level INT );
CREATE TABLE Answers ( answer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, question_id INT, answer_text TEXT, is_correct BOOLEAN );
CREATE TABLE Results ( result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_id INT, course_id INT, score FLOAT );
